name: Residential Energy Assistance Program (REAP)
description: Free home energy and water efficiency installations including weather stripping, attic insulation, heating systems, water heaters, showerheads, and lighting
fullDescription: The City of Palo Alto's REAP program provides free home energy and water efficiency upgrades to income-qualified residents, helping reduce utility costs through improved efficiency.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free weather stripping installation
- Free attic insulation
- Free heating system upgrades
- Free water heater replacement
- Free efficient showerheads
- Free energy-efficient lighting
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto Utilities customer
2. Must be eligible for RAP program
3. Or live in deed-restricted affordable housing
4. Or participate in other income-qualified programs
5. Complete application and home assessment
6. Receive free efficiency installations
keywords: Palo Alto, CPAU, REAP, free upgrades, weatherization, insulation, water heater, lighting, showerhead, low-income
